data.name: eden park
data.details: Eden Nature Park is a popular tourist destination located in Davao City, Philippines. It is a mountain resort that offers a variety of activities and amenities for visitors, including hiking, bird watching, and swimming. The park is known for its beautiful scenery and natural surroundings, which include waterfalls, gardens, and forests.

comments.message: It's very enjoyable staying here and I think it's very satisfying. The place is clean and well-kept, so it's a good place to stay.

data.name: mount apo trek
data.details: Mount Apo Trek is a place that offers amazing views, quiet relaxation, and a chance to get in touch with nature. It's also within the Davao area, so you can easily access it if you're in the region.
data.address: Mount Apo, Davao City, Davao del Sur

comments.message: It was a beautiful place. The view was amazing and I enjoyed it very much. The place was clean and the service was good. It is a good place to stay at.

data.name: malagos garden resort and chocolate museum

comments.message: I really enjoyed staying at the place. The view is beautiful, and the atmosphere was very relaxing. It felt like home, which is perfect for me.

data.name: people's park
data.details: The park features a variety of amenities and attractions, including a man-made lake, walking paths, landscaped gardens, playgrounds, and a stage for performances. It is also home to several sculptures and artwork, including a bronze statue of the late Philippine President and city mayor, Rodrigo Duterte.

comments.message: I think this place is amazing. The view is outstanding, and the entire area is just beautiful. It's very relaxing to be here, and I can't wait to come back!

data.name: roxas night market
data.details: The Roxas Night Market is a fun place to visit. It's in Davao, where you can go and buy food from the vendors. The market has a lot of vendors selling different types of food. This is a great place for people to eat and have some fun.

comments.message: When you're looking for a place to eat in the evening, you want it to be both delicious and affordable. And the best way to do this is with a food stall that serves up a wide variety of delicious dishes.

data.name: pearl farm beach resort
data.details: If you're looking for a place to relax and enjoy, look no further than Pearl Farm Beach Resort. This beach resort is within easy reach of the city of Davao and has several places where you can enjoy the sand and surf.

data.name: eagle park
data.details: Eagle Park is a beautiful place for relaxation and a great view. It's located in Davao City, and there are so many eagles that you'll want to take pictures with them! It's an amazing place to visit, whether you're looking for a place to relax or just want to see some beautiful birds.

comments.message: There are a lot of things to love about this park. I've seen and interacted with eagles in the park, which is a lot of fun. The place is also clean, which is always nice when you're lounging around. It's a great place to spend time with friends or family, and I recommend it for everyone!

data.name: samal island
data.details: Samal Island is a beautiful and relaxing place to visit. The beach is clean, the breeze is cool, and you can even walk across the sand like a giant! Come visit this place—you won't be disappointed.

data.name: crocodile park
data.details: Crocodile Park is a place to go if you're looking for adventure and excitement. Here, you can get up close and personal with crocodiles, snakes, lizards, monkeys, and other wild animals. You'll also be able to enjoy the park's beautiful landscape.
data.address: Crocodile Park,Riverfront, Corporate City, Diversion Highway，Ma-a, Davao City 8000 Philippines

comments.message: I have been spending time at the zoo park. I've seen and interacted with many animals. They are all very cute and interesting to watch.

data.name: waterworld beach resort
data.details: The Waterworld Beach Resort in Davao City is a tropical paradise that's got everything you need to have a great time. It's got a huge swimming pool, waterslides galore, and an adventure park for when you're done playing around in the water!
